function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate control over the quality of audio submissions","Impact":"Poor audio quality may lead to difficulty in understanding the content or may discourage engagement with the material","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidelines and examples for recording quality audio, offer support for contributors who are new to podcasting","Technologies":"Audio editing software, quality microphones, noise reduction tools","People":"Contributors, audience","Owner":"City Road, Dallas, Miles"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness or consideration for contagious disease transmission during audio recording","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to contributors being in close proximity or sharing recording equipment","Mitigation":"Mandate adherence to public health guidelines during recording, provide disposable microphone covers, encourage individual recording in controlled environments","Technologies":"Disposable microphone covers, remote recording tools, public health guidelines","People":"Contributors, audio editors","Owner":"City Road, Dallas, Miles"},{"Description":"Insufficient consideration for privacy and consent during recording","Impact":"Risk of inadvertently capturing private conversations or personal information in the audio submissions","Mitigation":"Require contributors to obtain consent for recording in public or private spaces, provide guidelines for respecting privacy and confidentiality","Technologies":"Consent forms, audio editing software for redaction, privacy guidelines","People":"Contributors, individuals mentioned in the recordings","Owner":"City Road, Dallas, Miles"}]}
